name: Kiwi Shake II
description: Kiwi Shake II is a refreshing beverage crafted from ripe, juicy kiwis blended into a smooth, creamy shake. Packed with vibrant fruit flavor and a hint of sweetness, it's the perfect cool-down drink for any time of the day, ideal for kiwi lovers seeking a tropical treat.

name: Blueberry Maze
description: Blueberry Maze is a delightful drink bursting with the sweet-tart essence of fresh blueberries. Blended into a silky smoothie, this beverage offers a refreshing and flavorful experience, perfect for a quick hydration break or a fruity indulgence on the go.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: Mango Smoothie is a nourishing tropical delight made from succulent mangoes blended with creamy yogurt. This vibrant drink is both refreshing and satisfying, offering a burst of natural sweetness and a smooth texture, making it an excellent choice for a healthy, flavorful refreshment.

name: Apple Juice
description: Apple Juice is a crisp and invigorating drink made from freshly pressed apples. With its natural sweetness and clean, refreshing taste, this beverage is perfect for all ages, offering a wholesome and hydrating option for any meal or snack time.

name: Pats Burger
description: Pats Burger is a mouthwatering classic featuring a juicy beef patty nestled in a soft bun, topped with fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and a special house sauce. Its bold flavors and satisfying texture make it a go-to choice for burger enthusiasts craving a hearty meal.

name: Cheese Burger
description: Cheese Burger is a timeless favorite, combining a succulent beef patty with melted cheddar cheese, crisp pickles, onions, and a tangy ketchup-mustard duo, all served in a toasted bun. This iconic burger delivers a perfect balance of savory and zesty flavors.

name: Chicken Burger
description: Chicken Burger is a delicious choice featuring a crispy, golden-fried chicken patty layered with fresh lettuce and creamy mayonnaise, all tucked into a soft bun. Its crunchy texture and savory taste make it a fantastic option for chicken lovers seeking a satisfying bite.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Veggie Burger is a wholesome delight crafted with a flavorful vegetable patty, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and a light, tangy sauce, served in a toasted bun. Perfect for vegetarians or anyone seeking a lighter, yet tasty burger option packed with fresh ingredients.

name: Berries Yogurt
description: Berries Yogurt is a delectable dessert made with creamy, smooth yogurt swirled with a medley of sweet and tart mixed berries. This refreshing treat is perfect as a light snack or a guilt-free indulgence, offering a balance of rich creaminess and fruity goodness.

name: Strawberry Yogurt
description: Strawberry Yogurt is a sweet and creamy snack featuring velvety yogurt blended with juicy, ripe strawberries. Its vibrant flavor and smooth texture make it an ideal choice for a refreshing dessert or a quick, satisfying treat any time of the day.

name: Plain Yogurt
description: Plain Yogurt is a simple yet versatile option, offering creamy, unsweetened yogurt with a smooth, rich texture. Perfect as a standalone snack or paired with fruits and granola, itâ€™s a healthy and customizable choice for those who enjoy pure, classic flavors.

name: Mango Yogurt
description: Mango Yogurt is a tropical treat combining creamy yogurt with the lush, sweet flavor of ripe mangoes. This vibrant dessert delivers a refreshing and exotic taste, making it a perfect choice for a light, flavorful snack or a delightful end to any meal.

name: Vanilla Cream
description: Vanilla Cream is an elegant dessert featuring a rich, velvety cream infused with the delicate flavor of pure vanilla. Its smooth texture and subtle sweetness make it a sophisticated treat, perfect for those who appreciate a classic, indulgent dessert experience.

name: Chocolate Cream
description: Chocolate Cream is a luscious dessert crafted with silky, rich cream blended with decadent chocolate. Its deep, indulgent flavor and creamy texture make it a heavenly treat for chocolate lovers, ideal as a luxurious snack or dessert to satisfy sweet cravings.

name: Strawberry Cream
description: Strawberry Cream is a refreshing dessert made with light, fluffy cream infused with the sweet, juicy flavor of fresh strawberries. Its vibrant taste and airy texture make it a delightful treat, perfect for a summery snack or a sweet finish to any meal.

name: Caramel Cream
description: Caramel Cream is a luxurious dessert featuring smooth, buttery cream swirled with rich, golden caramel. Its indulgent sweetness and creamy consistency create a sophisticated treat, ideal for those seeking a decadent and flavorful dessert experience.

name: Espresso
description: Espresso is a bold and robust coffee drink, crafted from finely ground beans brewed under high pressure to deliver a concentrated shot of rich, aromatic flavor. Perfect for coffee purists, it offers a strong, invigorating kick to start your day or boost your energy.

name: Latte
description: Latte is a smooth and creamy coffee beverage, combining a shot of bold espresso with steamed milk and a light foam topping. Its balanced flavor and velvety texture make it a comforting choice for coffee lovers seeking a rich yet mellow drink.

name: Cappuccino
description: Cappuccino is a perfectly balanced coffee drink, blending equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothy foam. Its bold coffee flavor, creamy texture, and airy foam create a classic, satisfying experience for those who enjoy a harmonious coffee beverage.

name: Mocha
description: Mocha is an indulgent coffee drink that combines rich espresso with decadent chocolate syrup, steamed milk, and a dollop of whipped cream. Its sweet, chocolatey flavor and creamy texture make it a delightful treat for those craving a luxurious coffee experience.
